title: 5DMarkIV 大戰 D810 大戰 A7rii

replies.msg:
Canon 全敗

Ultimately, it seems like Canon, despite being the newest and most expensive of the three, fell short of Nikon, Sony, or both in every test Slanted Lens put forward. There’s no overall winner here—your choice will (or should) be dictated by preference and how you intend to use it—but there may be an overall loser.
